text: Brian Saunderson (born 16 November 1961) is a Canadian rower. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==Political career== In 2018, Saunderson was elected mayor of the town of Collingwood. From 2014-18, he was deputy mayor. As of 2018, he has lived and worked as lawyer in Collingwood for 17 years. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Toronto
title: Brian Saunderson
